name: Clickin' Terraforming
description:
Give your rhythmic energy to the earth!

 Clicking notes will grow the trees and change the  planet to a spirited venue.

Notes:
Under 100MB zip file
Assets from market place: trees and earth mesh
Assets I made before the jam: the start button UI
Engine:UE4.23

Okay, I learned a little about Time Synth, Niagara, and Spectrum analysis for now ;)
